WeightedClassification.description: A weighted classification representing the probability/confidence that a segment belongs to a specific entity type. Part of the Superposition model - a single thought can be multiple things.

entity_type.description: The entity type this classification refers to

weight.description: Confidence/Weight (0.0 to 1.0) If > Threshold during collapse, we instantiate this entity.

description: A collection of weighted classifications representing the superposition of possible entity types for a single segment.
